{{Wired embedded system |brand=RPF |model=Raspberry Pi |revision=2 Model B (1GB) |upc=640522710515 |asin=B00T2U7R7I |price=35 |est_release_date=02/2015 |manuf_country=UK |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM2836 |cpu1_cspeed=900 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=B8132B4PB-8D-F |expansion_if_types=Micro SD Card, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN9514 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=HDMI out, audio out (3.5mm) }} [http://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-2-model-b/ Product page]
{{WPLink|Raspberry Pi}} :[http://elinux.org/RaspberryPiBoard '''elinux.org''''s Raspberry Pi subsection] :[http://elinux.org/RaspberryPi_Boards Board revision table w/ pictures]
==Additional external links== *[http://www.raspberrypi.org/archives/6299 '''''A birthday present from Broadcom''''' on the '''Raspberry Pi Foundation''''s news feed] :Full documentation for the '''VideoCore IV''' graphics core (used in the BCM2835) as :well as a complete source release of the graphics stack used by the BCM21553 :cellphone SoC (which also has a '''VideoCore IV''' core) has been released
===Models=== *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B (512MB)]] [http://www.raspberrypi.org/product/model-b/ PPage] [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 on '''OpenNet'''] :SoC Broadcom BCM2835 1-cores CPU ARM11 (ARM1176JZF-S @700MHz) : 512MB RAM, 2x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B+ (512MB)]] [http://www.raspberrypi.org/product/model-b-plus/ PPage] [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 on '''OpenNet'''] :SoC Broadcom BCM2835 1-cores CPU ARM11 (ARM1176JZF-S @700MHz) : 512MB RAM, 4x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi 2 Model B (1GB)]] [http://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-2-model-b/ PPage] [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=41585 on '''OpenNet'''] :SoC Broadcom BCM2836 4-cores CPU Cortex A7 (ARMv7 @900MHz) :1GB RAM, 4x USB 2.0
